page.title: 14EDUCATION IN MUTHILL
page.content: {Muthill Primary School }has 34 pupils (June 1985), aged between 5 and 12.{ {Roman Catholic pupils }attend St. Dominic's School in Crieff.A few children attend Morrison's Academy, or the primary school, in Crieff. {Muthill Primary School}has 2 teachers, with visiting specialists in Music, Art, Physical Education and Needlecraft. The present school was built in{1838 but it is recorded elsewhere that there was a parochial school of about 100 pupils around{1790}. One hundred years ago in{1885}the school had around{150}pupils, two teachers and three pupil teachers. In{ {1970}the roll was still above {100} with four teachers.There are four classrooms, one of which is used by a Playgroup.Community Groups and Evening Classes also meet in the school.
